attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow all Ghurkas who served in the British Army the right to live and abide in the United Kingdom along with their immediate family irrespective of when or where they served. Also to grant them a full pension including those who served before the current cut off date of 1997.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
